sentences.en: According to the thermodynamic parameters, the main acting force between indomethacin and HSA was determined.
sentences.cn: 根据热力学常数确定了它们之间的主要作用力类型.

sentences.en: Conclusion Photocatalyst and Indomethacin are effection to cure Actinic Cheilitis.
sentences.cn: 目的观察光触媒加消炎痛治疗光化性唇炎的效果.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Indomethacin decreased cell damage and improved perfusion in elevated intracompartment pressure.
sentences.cn: 结论: 当筋膜室内压力增加时,吲哚美辛减轻细胞损伤,增加灌注.

sentences.en: Dexamethasone ( Dex ) and indomethacin ( Ind ) also inhibited inflammatory reaction.
sentences.cn: 地塞米松 ( Dex ) 和吲哚美辛 ( Ind ) 也有类似的抗炎作用.

sentences.en: Existing studies have only considered indomethacin administration before induction of elevated intracompartment pressure.
sentences.cn: 现有的研究仅在增加骨筋膜室压力前给予吲哚美辛.

sentences.en: L - NAME and indomethacin were ineffective in inhibiting the vasodilating action induced by Ipt ( P > 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: L-NAME、吲哚美辛均不能抑制盐酸埃他卡林的舒血管作用 ( P>0.05 ).

sentences.en: Objective : To discuss the effects of morphine extradural acesodyne through pre using indomethacin suppository before operation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨术前预用吲哚美辛栓对吗啡硬膜外止痛效果的影响.

sentences.en: Objective : To study coating process of indomethacin sustained - release pellets with methylcellulose water dispersion.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究国产乙基纤维素水分散体包衣吲哚美辛缓释小丸的包衣工艺.

sentences.en: Objective To study the preparation process and quality control method of indomethacin liniment.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨吲哚美辛搽剂的制备及质量控制标准.

sentences.en: Objective:To study the protective effect of Weishusan on small intestinal lesions induced by indomethacin in rats.
sentences.cn: 目的：研究胃舒散对消炎痛所致大鼠小肠损伤的保护作用及机制。

sentences.en: RESULTS The ADR rate of indomethacin i n shanghai patients with arthro - ostearthropathy is about 48 1 %.
sentences.cn: 结果　上海骨关节疾病患者中口服吲哚美辛的不良反应发生率为481%.

sentences.en: The indomethacin ( IMC ) - loaded micelle ( ILM ) was produced with DgP as the polymeric carrier.
sentences.cn: 利用DgP作为高分子载体制备了吲哚美辛载药胶束 ( ILM ).

trans.tran_en: a drug administered orally to relieve pain, fever, and inflammation, esp in rheumatoid arthritis
